prompts.title: Business Plan Executive Summary
prompts.content:
Write an executive summary for [BUSINESS NAME]. Include:
- Company overview
- Problem being solved
- Solution/products
- Target market
- Competitive advantage
- Financial projections summary
- Funding requirements
- Team highlights
Max length: 2 pages

prompts.title: Competitive Analysis Framework
prompts.content:
Conduct a competitive analysis for [YOUR COMPANY] vs [COMPETITORS]. Analyze:
- Product features comparison
- Pricing strategies
- Market positioning
- Strengths/weaknesses
- Market share
- Customer reviews summary
- Opportunities for differentiation

prompts.title: Meeting Agenda Optimizer
prompts.content:
Create an effective meeting agenda for [MEETING PURPOSE]. Include:
- Objective statement
- Attendee list with roles
- Time allocations
- Discussion topics with owners
- Decision points
- Action items section
- Follow-up plan
Meeting duration: [TIME]

prompts.title: OKR Goal Setting Assistant
prompts.content:
Create OKRs for [DEPARTMENT/TEAM] for [QUARTER]. Include:
- 3 Objectives
- 3-4 Key Results per objective
- Metrics and targets
- Alignment with company goals
- Dependencies
- Risk factors
- Success criteria

prompts.title: Partnership Proposal Template
prompts.content:
Draft a partnership proposal for [PARTNER COMPANY]. Include:
- Mutual benefits
- Proposed collaboration model
- Revenue/resource sharing
- Timeline and milestones
- Success metrics
- Risk mitigation
- Next steps
Tone: Professional, win-win focused
